column4: Hi everyone. I have a webcam, WCam 300a. I searched google but i didn't manage to find anything. Could you give me a start point to install the webcam on Ubuntu 8.04. ?
thank you Abed, i'll try that
it sais this : E: Invalid operation camorama
sorry it is sudo apt-get install camorama
yes, i tried it that way, now it works
then try camorama in the terminal
i got only a grey screen
it's being recognised : Bus 003 Device 002: ID 055f:d003 Mustek Systems, Inc.
i still don't see my kind of cam in that forum :|
test the rest and if it doesn't work on google with ur cam name and ur os { ubuntu}
don't forget to tell me the result
